Module com.example.milionerzy
Package com.example.milionerzy

Class Scoreboard

java.lang.Object
com.example.milionerzy.Scoreboard
public class Scoreboard extends Object
Controller class for the scoreboard functionality. Displays the top 10 scores retrieved from the server.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the Scoreboard controller. Fetches the top 10 scores from the server and displays them in the corresponding Text elements.

    • goBackToMainMenu

      private void goBackToMainMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Navigates back to the main menu screen.
      Parameters:
      event - The triggering ActionEvent.

    • setEmptyResults

      private void setEmptyResults()
      Sets the Text elements to display empty results.

    • processScoreboardResults

      private void processScoreboardResults(String result)
      Processes the scoreboard results and sets the Text elements accordingly.
      Parameters:
      result - The raw result string from the server.
